intro: Calonema pendens, commonly known as the hanging calonema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia, particularly Malaysia and Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its trailing growth habit and clusters of small, tubular flowers that range in color from white to pink.
